Title: Authorizes self-station gas stations to allow hands-free gas dispensing
Summary: Authorizes self-service gas stations to allow for hands-free gas dispensing by installing hold open clips on gasoline and diesel fuel dispensing nozzles.
LawCode: Add ยง396-xx, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to allowing hands-free gas dispensing at self-service gas stations
